title: Landing Page for a Burger Shop
description:
Designed and developed a landing page for a Burger Shop who wants to display their product details on the landing page.
The client wants a minimal design with a BIG image of a burger on the top, so I displayed a big burger image on the top inside an egg-shaped vessel.
Also displayed their products under the products section and created a wonderful gallery of images under the photos section.

projectImages.title: Hero section of the landing page
Client's testimonials section with hover effect
Bold amazing footer with contact form above

title: Custom designed personal portfolio
description:
Here is a sample of my work that I designed and developed for a college student. 
I designed a personal portfolio that mentioned about her, education history, skills, social links, every projects that she made, and more. 
Also, designed a contact with a map integration, and developed a contact form that sent all the entered details to her telegram account with a minimal simple footer. 
Her demanded for a minimal design with slike pink shades includes dark theme, so here is the portfolio I designed for her.

projectImages.title: Hero section of the portfolio website
Client's social media and project section
Minimal Footer section with map & contacts

title: Personal portfolio for a civil engineer
description: The client wants a parallax design with a scrolling effect and his name on the top so I have designed this hero template for the client and below that rest information is mentioned. Also, the client wants the zig-zag pattern architecture for his portfolio so that users can read about the experience and also check the image side by side so according to that, I have designed this wonderful zig-zag pattern about section and experience with cards where all the services are mentioned that client provides. As per the compliment I have implemented the telegram bot that sends the contact information that users entered in the contact form directly to the client's telegram account.

projectImages.title: Hero section of the portfolio website
Client's about, experience and project section
Minimal Footer section with contact & services

title: Portfolio Website for an Architect
description: The client wants a minimal design with her basic details like BIG name of her and designation on the bottom of her name so I have designed this hero template for the client and below that rest information is mentioned. Implemented the skills bar as per the client's requirement and designed cards for the experiences and project view with services mentioned below. Also, the client wants to get all the notifications of the contact form on their telegram so I implemented a bot that redirected all the messages in the client's telegram account.

projectImages.title: Hero section of the portfolio website
Minimal Footer section with contact & services
